description: This file initializes a Milvus vector database, creates a PDF knowledge base with a specific URL, and sets up an agent to interact with this knowledge base, including loading data asynchronously and generating a response to a query.

classes.name: Milvus
classes.description: A class representing the Milvus vector database, used for storing and retrieving vector data.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class representing a knowledge base built from PDF URLs, integrated with a vector database.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing an agent that interacts with the knowledge base to process queries and generate responses.

methods.name: aload
methods.description: Asynchronously loads data into the knowledge base, with an option to recreate the data.

methods.name: aprint_response
methods.description: Asynchronously generates and prints a response to a given query, optionally in markdown format.
